title: Penne with Almond Red Pepper Pesto
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 red peppers, chopped', '30g (1 oz) almonds', '1 dessertspoon balsamic vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', 'pinch dried crushed chillies', '375g (13 oz) broccoli florets', '1 (500g) pack penne pasta', '30g (1 oz) Parmesan cheese, grated', 'handful fresh basil leaves, cut into thin strips']
